remediation: Upgrade paddlepaddle to version 2.6.0 or higher.
title: OS Command Injection

vulnDescription.Overview: paddlepaddle is a Parallel Distributed Deep Learning Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to OS Command Injection via the get_online_pass_interval function. An attacker can execute arbitrary commands on the operating system by supplying malicious input.
vulnDescription.PoC: from paddle.incubate.distributed.fleet.fleet_util import FleetUtil fleet_util = FleetUtil() online_pass_interval = fleet_util.get_online_pass_interval( days="{20190720..20190729}", hours="9;touch /home/test/aaaa", split_interval=5, split_per_pass=2, is_data_hourly_placed=False )

source_code.diff:
@@ -1317,7 +1317,23 @@ def get_online_pass_interval(
                 ...     is_data_hourly_placed=False)
 
         """
+        assert (
+            "|" not in days
+            and ";" not in days
+            and "\\" not in days
+            and "/" not in days
+            and "(" not in days
+            and ")" not in days
+        ), r"days should not contain [|,;,\,/,(,)]"
         days = os.popen("echo -n " + days).read().split(" ")
+        assert (
+            "|" not in hours
+            and ";" not in hours
+            and "\\" not in hours
+            and "/" not in hours
+            and "(" not in hours
+            and ")" not in days
+        ), r"hours should not contain [|,;,\,/,(,)]"
         hours = os.popen("echo -n " + hours).read().split(" ")
         split_interval = int(split_interval)
         split_per_pass = int(split_per_pass)
